pageProps.title: MLflow
pageProps.teaser: An open source platform for the machine learning lifecycle

data.title: MLflow
data.slogan: An open source platform for the machine learning lifecycle
data.description: MLflow is an open source platform to manage the ML lifecycle, including experimentation, reproducibility, deployment, and a central model registry. MLflow currently offers four components: Tracking, Projects, Models and Registry.
data.author: Databricks
